author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Morgan Stanley, HP, Salesforce, Amazon, Tesla, Analog Devices, Michael Kors
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 1.4%: Shares of the Wall Street firm tumbled 5.8% Tuesday, their largest one-day percentage decline since February 2016, with investors worried debt-heavy governments like Italy’s could weigh on the banking sector. & Co. shares added The 'Severe' Costs of Leaving the Euro Next Brexit & Beyond: Italy's President Searches for Solution
